item.title: 'The whole thing fell apart': Inside the oil price meltdown
item.description:
The last time crude was this cheap was in 1870 but for some storage operators, it's jackpot time, writes Ed Clowes
For hedge fund manager Joe Mares, the apocalyptic oil crash was historic in more ways ...
item.author: newsfeeds@nzherald.co.nz

item.title: A mates' trip to New York, a rugby team and a stag party - NZ's 16 Covid-19 clusters
item.description:
Do you know more about any of New Zealand's clusters? Email us.
Many of them are linked to big events, described as "a mixing bowl for infection" by the Ministry of Health.
There are two weddings ...
